Replace.Text: Gathering of light
Gathering of light
Noel
The power of cohesion

When you unlock the first technology of a new era, you gain [ICON_SCIENCE] equal to twice the total amount of science required to unlock that technology. Each level of building in the academy provides +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] production.
Magic Unleashed
When the academy building is completed, a large amount of [ICON_SCIENCE] science value (10*X) is obtained in proportion to the progress of the era. (X is the square of the city's population)
Noel White
The power of cohesion-white
Each turn you gain [ICON_Gold] coins equal to 3% of the national treasury. [NEWLINE]When you are the sovereign, each city-state under your jurisdiction will give you [ICON_Gold] coins +7%.
Magic Unleashed-White
When using [ICON_Gold] coins to purchase, you can enjoy an X% discount, and vice versa when in a war state. (X is the accumulated number of rounds)
Noel Black
The power of cohesion-black
Industrial Zone buildings construction time is halved. [NEWLINE]Each Industrial Zone and its buildings grant +10% [ICON_Production] productivity to the city where it is located.
Magic Unleashed-Black
When a non-civilian unit, building, or wonder is built, you gain [ICON_Culture] culture equal to X% of the cost. (X is the cumulative number of turns)
Noel-Angel of Light
The Power of Holy Light
When you obtain a Great Scientist, you will get a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka. When [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka is triggered, all cities' [ICON_Production] production progress is increased by 20%.
Magic Unleashed - Ultimate

Civilian units gain the "Fund Research" ability. When the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka is triggered, immediately gain 50% [ICON_Gold] of the total tech value required to unlock the corresponding technology.
Magical Container
Replaces the Academy. It is cheaper to build and gives +15% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science to the city if it has at least +4 adjacent bonuses.
Magical Container - White
Replaces the Commercial Center, unlocks the "Foreign Trade" Civic, is cheaper to build, and gains 1% of the treasury's [ICON_Gold] coins per turn if it has at least +4 adjacency bonus.
Magic Container-Black

A cheaper alternative to an Industrial Zone. If it has at least +4 adjacency bonus, the city's [ICON_Production] Production adjacency bonus also provides [ICON_Culture] Culture and Industrial Zone buildings provide +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
Magical Container - Zhizhen

Replaces Industrial District, unlocked with "Currency" technology, cheaper to build, and with at least +4 adjacency bonuses, all builders produced by the city receive an additional +1 [ICON_Charges] build. [NEWLINE][COLOR:Red] However, it is mutually exclusive with Commercial Center and cannot be built in the same city as Commercial Center. [ENDCOLOR]
Magic Elf
Replaces the Scout, has higher mobility, and has faster [ICON_Movement] movement in hills, woods and rainforests, as well as on flat terrain.
Faster movement in hills, woods and rainforests than on flat terrain [ICON_Movement]
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Productivity comes from adjacent canals.
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production from adjacent rivers.
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production comes from adjacent ports.
Gathering of light
[COLOR:Civ6Yellow]Use gold to build a city [ENDCOLOR]
Build a city in this cell
The treasury does not have enough gold coins (requires {1_Str} gold coins, and is {2_Str} short)
[COLOR_RED]Too close to other cities[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]The current terrain cannot be settled [ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]The current landscape is uninhabitable[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]Cannot perform this operation on region [ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]Cannot perform this operation on improvements[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]Cannot perform this operation in another player's territory[ENDCOLOR]
Funding research
Constructing a district, building, or wonder provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] production, capped at half the current treasury reserves, minus [ICON_GOLD] gold that is twice the production capacity.
Details: Consumes {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, adds {3_Num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] production to {2_str}.
The treasury is negative!
This operation cannot be performed in another player's territory
Must be in the city center
Must be used for a district, building, or wonder
Angel Voice
Likes civilizations that announce friendly relations and keep peace. Dislikes civilizations that denounce or attack their friends or allies.
(Like to declare friendship)
(Hate you to condemn her friend)
You condemned her friends.
O Saviour, You have infinite and powerful potential!
O Saviour, You have infinite and powerful potential!
O Saviour, You have infinite and powerful potential!
O Saviour, You have infinite and powerful potential!
Holy light! O blazing soul! Holy power, grant me miracles... and then... punish evil!!
Holy light! O blazing soul! Holy power, grant me miracles... and then... punish evil!!
Holy light! O blazing soul! Holy power, grant me miracles... and then... punish evil!!
Holy light! O blazing soul! Holy power, grant me miracles... and then... punish evil!!
Nice to meet you. My name is Noel. I hope you will give me your guidance from now on.
Your actions are too evil, I will punish you with divine power! This does not include mercy for the enemy.
Waging an evil war against me is unforgivable! I will use my divine power to defeat the evil in your heart!
(You followed Noel's agenda)
(You violated Noel's agenda)
Ah... Ahem, ... Sorry, divine power. The power I received from you... was wasted...!
Ah... Ahem, ... Sorry, divine power. The power I received from you... was wasted...!
As a symbol of our friendship...hehe...please enjoy this cake?
Maybe I can't be your friend this time, but when you become more righteous, join me in punishing evil.
Do you want to take our relationship to the next level?
…Great, please give me your advice, my new friend!
Well, forget it.
Thanks.
I am too exhausted from recent battles to greet your delegation, sorry...
This is my favorite cake. I give it to you as my gift. I hope you can accept it.
Such filthy and vicious words, is it possible for a human being to say them?
(Condemn you)
welcome……
visit?……
Let's visit each other, shall we? ...
Hello? It seems... not so reliable... I can't help it. I'm Noel. It's okay if you don't give me any more advice.
For such a big thing, you must follow your heart. So I am standing here now, what about you? ~
All right……
I reject
This evil war has been going on for too long. I hope that no more sacrifices will be made for the sake of innocent people. Let us call for a truce!
Yes, but please don't stay...
Sorry, we cannot let you pass because we are on guard against the invasion of evil forces...
We are sorry, but we would like to pass through your territory in search of traces of evil. Do you agree?
Could you please remove the troops? I am afraid the people will panic.
No way...
I agree with your proposal.
Nice to meet you. My name is Noel. I hope you will give me your guidance from now on.
Your actions are too evil, I will punish you with divine power! This does not include mercy for the enemy.
Waging an evil war against me is unforgivable! I will use my divine power to defeat the evil in your heart!
(You followed Noel's agenda)
(You violated Noel's agenda)
